limit.description: Number of posts to come back on each url request.

retry_interval.description: When a url request fails, how long to wait before attempting to try again.

retry_limit.description: When a url request fails, number of times to attempt a retry before giving up.

queries.description: List of channel IDs to query.

lookback.description: On block start, look back this amount of time to grab old posts.

nio/YouTubeChannel.Description:
Create a signal for each new video post, given a channel ID. When you view the source code of a channel page on YouTube, the channel ID is found by searching for "channelId".
Official documentation [here](https://developers.google.com/youtube/v3/docs/search).

limit.description: Number of posts to come back on each url request.

retry_interval.description: When a url request fails, how long to wait before attempting to try again.

retry_limit.description: When a url request fails, number of times to attempt a retry before giving up.

queries.description: List of user channels to query.

lookback.description: On block start, look back this amount of time to grab old posts.

nio/YouTubeUser.Description:
Create a signal for each new video post, given a user name. When you view the source code of a channel page on YouTube, the channel ID is found by searching for "channelId".
Differs from **YouTubeChannel** in that it is configured with a list of usernames (rather than channel IDs), which are preprocessed to produce a list of channel IDs to be used in subsequent YouTube Search requests.
Official documentation [here](https://developers.google.com/youtube/v3/docs/search).

retry_limit.description: When a url request fails, number of times to attempt a retry before giving up.

limit.description: Number of posts to come back on each url request.

retry_interval.description: When a url request fails, how long to wait before attempting to try again.

exclude.description: List of terms to exclude from results.

queries.description: List of queries to search for.

lookback.description: On block start, look back this amount of time to grab old posts.

nio/YouTubeSearch.Description: Create a signal for each new video post for a given query. Official documentation [here](https://developers.google.com/youtube/v3/docs/search).
